name: José Barros
description: '''José Benito Barros''' or simply '''José Barros''' (March 21, 1915 in [[El Banco]], [[Magdalena Department|Magdalena]] – May 12, 2007 in [[Santa Marta]], [[Magdalena Department|Magdalena]]) was a prominent [[Colombian people|Colombian]] musician, and composer of more than 800 songs in genres including [[cumbia]], [[porro]], [[merengue (music)|merengue]], [[currulao]], [[Paseo music|paseo]], [[bolero]] and [[tango music|tango]].
